column4: Do you know of any way to customize desktop sound effects.. or is that lacking in the gdm?
gdm starts as its own user (called gdm) you can sort of tweak some things it does by running the gnome control panel tools as the gdm user.. but that can also screw things up
So right now with Karmic, there is no easy wat to customize sound effects. correct?
no idea.i always turn them off. :)
